page.title: 01CLAUGHTON-ON-BROCK LANCS.
page.content: OUR AREA COVERS ONE OF THE MOST BEAUTIFUL PARTS OF LANCASHIRE.BESIDES WELL KEPT AND CULTIVATED FARMS,THERE IS AN ABUNDANCE OF UNSPOILT COUNTRYSIDE IN AN AREA BORDERED BY TWO RIVERS,THE CALDER AND THE BROCK,WHICH PROVIDES A GREAT VARIETY OF PLANTS AND WILD LIFE FOR THE NATURE LOVER TO DISCOVER. ALTHOUGH CLAUGHTON HAS A SMALL POPULATION OF ABOUT 240,THE PEOPLE WHO LIVE HERE FORM A CLOSE-KNIT COMMUNITY, WITH A LIVELY VILLAGE LIFE CENTERED ROUND THE SCHOOL AND CHURCH. LOCAL HISTORY 1066 BROCK.
